WorkItem.Description: I tested this on ExcelDataReder of v2.1 using ExcelBinaryReader. I got autogenerated report which doesn't have correct LastColumn and LastRow set in its dimension (excel populates them correctly but external tools might not do this). Therefore last few records are not read from such file and exception is raised because index of column accessed is greater than total number of columns specified in the file's dimension.
WorkItem.Summary: Not all rows are read from XLS file when its dimension is not correctly set.

Comments.Message: Have you tried with the latest code from the repository rather than the packaged binary?

This is based on source code "exceldatareader-82970" downloaded from "SOURCE CODE" tab. Actually I wrote this issue because I debugged source code and this way I found incorrect values of dimension from my excel file.
